snippet.title: Glitter Justice — Now in development
snippet.description:
Glitter Justice is an upcoming indie FPS game where you’ll wield an arsenal full of love and surprises!

From heart blasters to glitter grenades, every weapon is a delightful expression of girl power. Embrace your inner sparkle princess as you spread love and chaos across the futuristic cityscape, defeating waves of enemies with a touch of whimsy and a sprinkle of magic.

Invite your besties to join the fun in co-op mode, coordinate your dazzling attacks, and unleash glitter storms on your foes!

Wishlist now on Steam! ✨
